name: The Darkness (itch) (VarcyonSariouGames)
description:
You crashed on this planet! This bright bright planet. Your ship is beyond repair and you must wait 10 days until you are able to be rescued.

There is something strange about this planet. The nights seem to have a screaching in the distance.

You must survive until you are rescued... can you?

(gather, harvest and craft)

Stream Progress here

https://www.twitch.tv/varcy0n/videos
